title: DAJING Kids Paint Brushes Set - 10Pcs Round & Flat Art Brushes, Soft Hog Bristle, Easy Clean, Perfect for Washable, Tempera, Acrylic Paints, Arts & Crafts, Gift Idea
features: 1. KIDS PAINT BRUSHES SET: DAJING paint brushes for children come with 10 pcs, including 5pcs round and 5 flat paint brushes, featuring colorful handles, perfect for young artists to explore their creativity in painting and crafting.

2. HIGH QUALITY PAINT BRUSHES SET FOR KIDS: Made of soft hog bristle, bright colored handles, and rust-proof ferrules, these children's paint brushes ensure no shedding. Each brush measures 6 1/4 inches (16cm) in length and 1/2"(1.3cm) in ferrule diameter, making them easy for little hands to grip and control.

3. WIDE APPLICATIONS: The combination of round and flat craft paint brushes works great with washable paint, tempera paint, and acrylic paint. They are suitable for a variety of arts and crafts, including rock, leather, gesso, ceramic, or body, nail, and face art painting.

4. EASY TO CLEAN: After using the paint brushes for acrylic, oil, or watercolor painting, they can be easily cleaned with warm soapy water. Reshape the tips after cleaning to keep these craft paint brushes in good condition for long-lasting use.

5. GREAT GIFT IDEA: These all-purpose paint brushes for kids make an excellent gift for students, children, and painters of all levels. Perfect for school projects, birthday parties, painting parties, art parties, back-to-school supplies, and classroom decoration.
description: DAJING presents a high-quality paint brushes set designed specifically for kids. This set includes 10 pieces, consisting of 5 round and 5 flat paint brushes, each with colorful handles. Made from soft hog bristles, these brushes are durable and feature rust-proof ferrules. The brushes measure 6 1/4 inches (16cm) in length and have a ferrule diameter of 1/2"(1.3cm), making them perfectly sized for small hands. They work well with washable, tempera, and acrylic paints, offering a wide range of applications from traditional canvas painting to more creative uses like rock, leather, gesso, and ceramic painting, as well as body, nail, and face art. Cleaning is a breeze; simply use warm soapy water and reshape the brush tips to maintain their quality over time. Whether it's for school, a party, or just for fun, this versatile set is a wonderful gift idea for any child who loves to paint.
